question: Which special Day is observed on December 10 with the theme of ‘Recover Better - Stand Up for Human Rights’?
option4: Day for Elimination of Racial Discrimination
explanation:
Human Rights Day is observed every year on 10 December across the world. It commemorates the day the United Nations General Assembly adopted the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR) in 1948.
This year, the day was observed with the theme of ‘Recover Better - Stand Up for Human Rights’.
